popoutSelection.label: Popout → specific users
popoutSelection.description: Select specific users to share with

fullscreenSelection.label: Fullscreen → specific users
fullscreenSelection.description: Select specific users to share with

sceneFit.label: Scene
sceneFit.description: Share media to the current scene (fit)

sceneFill.label: Scene → fill
sceneFill.description: Share media to the current scene (fill)

darkness.label: Darkness
darkness.description: Apply darkness based on scene lighting

clear.history.label: Clear history
clear.history.description: Are You Sure? All media within the media history log will be permanently deleted.

tool.label: Toggle Media Layer
tool.zero: No media shared on the current scene, share media on the scene before activating the media layer.

tile.label: Share Media Configuration
tile.enabled.label: Share Media Tile
tile.enabled.hint: Enable this tile as a boundary for scene media sharing.
tile.name.label: Tile Name
tile.name.hint: Tile identifier to easily identify which tile you are selecting for scene sharing.

area.label: Area Selector
area.description: Choose an area from the list. Hover to preview the area, then select your preferred area.
area.zero:
No Share Media areas detected.

Region: you must create at least one Scene Region with at least one shape and with at least one enabled behavior type: "{type}" on the current scene.

Tile: you must create at least one tile with Share Media enabled on the current scene.

user.label: User Selector
user.description: Choose one or multiple users from the list. Gamemasters always receive shared media unless they are blacklisted.

share.label: Share Selector
share.description: Choose how to share this media and configure the settings for your selected sharing method. Click validate when ready to share.

defaultMediaSettings.label: Default Media Settings
defaultMediaSettings.name: Configure Default Media Settings
defaultMediaSettings.hint: Configure the default settings that will be applied when sharing media with players.
defaultMediaSettings.description: These are default settings that will be automatically applied when sharing media. You can override these settings for each individual media if needed.

mediaSidebarSettings.label: Media Sidebar Settings
mediaSidebarSettings.name: Configure Media Sidebar
mediaSidebarSettings.hint: Configure display and access settings for the media sidebar.
mediaSidebarSettings.description: Controls visibility and access permissions for the sidebar that displays all previously shared media. Configure whether the sidebar is enabled, restrict access to gamemasters only, and control which media sharing methods are displayed in the sidebar.

general.label: General preferences
general.enabled.label: Enable Sidebar
general.enabled.hint: Enable the sidebar to display shared media history.
general.gmOnly.label: Gamemasters Only
general.gmOnly.hint: Only allow gamemasters to access the sidebar.

layers.label: Media sharing methods
layers.hint: Select which sharing methods will be tracked in the media history and displayed in the sidebar.
layers.popout.label: Popout Sharing
layers.popout.hint: Display media shared in popout windows in the sidebar.
layers.fullscreen.label: Fullscreen Sharing
layers.fullscreen.hint: Display media shared in fullscreen mode in the sidebar.
layers.scene.label: Scene Sharing
layers.scene.hint: Display media shared to scenes in the sidebar.

entitySharingSettings.label: Entity Sharing Settings
entitySharingSettings.name: Configure Entity Sharing Settings
entitySharingSettings.hint: Configure how sharing buttons and context menu entries appear for game entities.
entitySharingSettings.description: Control the display and behavior of media sharing settings for entities. Configure whether sharing options appear on tokens, as context menu entries on sheets, or both, and whether entity names are displayed as captions.

options.sheet.label: Sheet Context Menu
options.sheet.hint: Add media sharing entries to the sheet context menu.
options.hud.label: HUD Button
options.hud.hint: Display media sharing buttons directly on the HUD.
options.caption.label: Show Entity Caption
options.caption.hint: Display the entity name alongside shared media.

blacklistSettings.label: User Blacklist
blacklistSettings.name: Configure User Blacklist
blacklistSettings.hint: Exclude specific users from receiving shared media.
blacklistSettings.description: Check the boxes next to users you want to exclude from receiving shared media.
